TextLibrary.Text: The Minotaur Slaver was too powerful for you. You must try again.
The Minotaur Slaver has been defeated. You take the Tail of Sartek.
The Tail of Sartek has been returned. Only 5 more pieces remain.
You must travel to Blackhoof and fight for the Tail.
You must return the Tail to the Horned Temple.
This Minotaur Slaver wields the Tail of Sartek as a whip. When matching Red Mana it does from 1-10 extra damage.
